title: codereview.py extension fails to submit hg copied files
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.from the root of the golang tree run: hg copy src/pkg/runtime/print.c .
2.hg change print.c
3.fill in the change description in the editor, save and exit.

What is the expected output?
A prompt for codereview email address should appear followed by a password prompt.

What do you see instead?
abort: print.c@1eec33c03bce: not found in manifest!

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?


Which operating system are you using?
linux (x86-64, opensuse-11.2)

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
1eec33c03bce+ release.2010-09-22/release

Please provide any additional information below.
